title: Looking for a duo partner (pref support or jungle) to climb with (Silver-Gold) Mainly ADC/Mid player

replies.body: Im uh bronze 2 looking to get to silver. Should I try to get a silver player or a bronzie? Cos i cant tell the difference from b2 skill level to a s4 skill level. They seem very similar.
Added I am 'ASH IS 1" I main Jungle/Support/Top/Mid/ - - - ADC being my weakest
Good day to you! I'm a silver 2 player looking to reach gold this season. I mainly play Graves in the jungle. I would happily add you to my friends list. Come play anytime üòÅ
